column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) Let 's say it 's like Hitler 's Germany , would intervention be necessary then ?
#Text=Johnson : Well yeah .
#Text=The notion of ...
#Text=Well first of all , let me borrow from a Supreme Court Justice that was asked his definition of pornography .
#Text=[ He said ]
#Text=You know what , I ca n't give you a definition of pornography but I 'd like to think that when I see it I recognize it .

#Text=And so when you talk about humanitarian , when you talk about atrocities , when you talk about genocide , when you talk about the Holocaust , I do n't think any of us want to stand by and watch something like that happen .
#Text=How do you define that ?
#Text=Well as the commander-in-chief , I 'd like to think I 'd be the first one that would recognize it if it actually was occurring .
#Text=And of course , as the leader of the United States , I would have to be articulate in that and make my case for intervention .

#Text=If we were to intervene , first and foremost would be Congress vetting that and actually approving that , but look , I just think that we militarily intervene as a result of our military intervention , but I think we have hundreds of millions of enemies to this country that look for our military intervention that otherwise would not exist .
#Text=We kill tens of thousands of innocent civilians in the countries where we militarily intervene .
#Text=Our men and service women end up dying .
#Text=Our men and service women come back with their limbs blown off .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) You were the governor of a border state . As president , what would you do to prevent the violence in Mexico from spilling over into the United States ?
#Text=Johnson : That violence is a prohibition phenomenon .
#Text=If you legalize marijuana , arguably 75 percent of that border violence with Mexico goes away .
#Text=These are disputes that are being played out with guns rather than the courts .
#Text=Forty thousand deaths south of the border over the last four years .
#Text=These are disputes that are being played out with guns rather than the courts .
#Text=( ( WSS ) ) But as president , would you increase border security or would you keep it the same ?
#Text=Johnson : No. I would not build a fence .
#Text=I think there would be less of a need for border security if we had a moving line for immigrants that would want to come into this country and work to get a work visa .
#Text=So my pledge is I 'm going to create a moving line for immigrants that want to come into this country and work to get a work visa .
#Text=That would entail a background check and a Social Security card so that applicable taxes would get paid .
#Text=I am espousing eliminating income tax , corporate tax , abolishing the IRS and replacing it all with one federal consumption tax : the fair tax .
#Text=If we adopt the fair tax , taxes will not be an issue .
#Text=Whether you 're illegal , legal , a visitor to the U.S. , or a U.S. citizen , nobody is going to avoid paying one federal consumption tax .
